就剧情而言，具哲学性，且有教育意义，但并不感枯燥和老土；
就内容而言，相对一代丰富很多，许多彩蛋可以挖掘，增加了可操作性；
就游戏性而言，速通不是难题，但若想通遍全图，需要花点时间和会比较乏味。

建议：
一、增加“职业组合”的增益状态，如 政府军组合的增益
二、增加“扫荡”功能，允许玩家对已探索/低等级的地区进行快速探索，节省时间
三、在地图内探索中，增加走/跑选项，允许玩家调整移动速度以进行物品收集

name: Hardspace: Shipbreaker
reviews:
I am german so I like to play working games in my free time.

UPDATE: The game got better, there is now more work to do!
backwards space engineers

Sweet taste of being an Imperial Slave.

Nobody will hear our cries in space.

A billion debt, when will it end ?

No wonder my fellow co-worker went to join the USG Ishimura.

I wish my real-life experience of endless debt-slavery were as enjoyably zen-like as taking apart space ships that are perfectly fine and suffering from mere planned obsolescens.

11/10. If the future of economic exploitation is this relaxing, sign me up!

I work a blue-collar job cleaning machinery 5 days a week, 8+ hours a day to pay off my life's debt..and when I come home to relax..I play a blue-collar job dismantling spaceships 7 days a week, 15 minutes a day to pay off my life's debt.

Genius.

This game has a niche. It's niche is all the weird kids who took screwdrivers, dremels and saws to their toys to take them apart and see how they work on a rainy saturday afternoon when the cartoons were over.

It me. I'm the weird kid.
If you're like me, and you have weird delusions of the nobility of manual labor, then this game lets you live those dreams without having to lose your beer belly.

You can pet the cat
You can pet the dog
You can carry the cat
You can carry the dog
You can carry both the cat and the dog at the same time

Game of the century
how do real life ricer farmers plant their rice in such perfect straight lines? it is a mystery.
Grow rice, show your friends a bucket of poop, serve up a meal of nothing but booze, see a baby get slapped, pet a doggo, Fun game.

At the end of your play session, you now know how to farm rice, and a bit of demon-slaying.

You can pet animals.
You can eat animals.
You can eat demons.
You can eat rice.
You also drink rice.

Bread doesn't look appealing anymore.

I watched some of my favorite Hololive play this game, and oh boy is it fun. I love me some beat em up games with a bit of farming simulator. Also, doesn't hurt that Naomi Oozora (Satania) is the VA for the main character. HA↗HA↘HA↗HA↘HA↗HA↘HA↗

reviews:
There are two things you can do to make your players angry.
The first is to have an abrupt, unceremonious ending with no closure and the second is

Steam: Steamkind Divided

A war between great gameplay and microtransactions.
Game series that goes to great lengths to show how corporate greed is bad has fallen victim to corporate greed. There are no words.

One-use-only microtransactions in a full-priced singleplayer game?

I never asked for this.
After playing Cyberpunk...maybe we were too harsh on this game
If you love microtransactions, you'll love this <3

I never asked for this.

Here is my Ticket to Ride review in haiku form. Brace yourself.

Collect cards to route
Be a jerk and block others
Endless enjoyment
I never win, and get angry every game. 10/10

Good digital representation of one of the board games I grew up with.

I was very crushed to find that I'm NOT the best Ticket to Ride player in the world.

If you love the game, buy this. DLC are ongoing, but they can be found on sale regularly.

Or wait for the rare bundle.
Ticket To Ride will make you go from adoring your friends to hating their f-ucking guts in no time—guaranteed.

name: Dicey Dungeons
reviews: I read peoples negative reviews because of the "RNG"... it's dice. Dice are literally RNG
This game takes more skill than Hearthstone
This is a really fun game, and I hate it
"Now lets play a nice wholesome game of Eels and Escalators"
Oh no, it's 5 am and I have to work tomorrow.

You play as a die
Your goal is to "not die"
You can roll the die
Manipulate the die
Tweak the die
Customize your die
Unlock a die

Die is the singular form of Dice. I roll one die. How did you turn me into a die? I have three dice this turn. They use "dice" everywhere and it's this kind of degeneracy that's causing the downfall of western civilization.

Anyone who says this game is bad is cringe and unironically whining about RNG in a game with "Dicey" in its title, a game about dice rolling dice to get a chance to roll a rigged wheel

Anyone who says this game is good is based and dice-pilled

- Be me just unlocking the thief
- Realized how cool it is to steal an enemy's move each fight
- Fought some potion doctor
- Used her move that makes you transform into a bear
- Fight ends and still bear.

10/10 who needs thief when you can be big strong bear.
